reviewText: I love these!  such a great value.  my kids love them.  at first I was really annoyed by the voices, and veggies (??)  but they grew on me, and I love the stories told in a way that still leaves it open for you to tell the true story by going back to the bible.
Very creative and well written stories combining traditional Bible stories with familiar tales; excellent family entertainment; our two year old loves these
This came here in excellent condition and was here way sooner than i ever expected. Will definitaley order from this place again!

Mo and the Big Exit, retelling the story of Moses and the Pharaoh, is the basis of our Video lesson in Rotation Sunday School.  It handles the plagues of Egypt in a humorous way that isn't frightening to young children, but still is clear in getting the point across.  I have found that the VeggieTales movies really hold the children's attention more than other animated movies. Our Sunday School kids are big VeggieTales' fans!
We watch these with the children to explain what is hidden in the stories.
Grandson is beginning to watch; his thank-you note was just written, so he hasn't had much time to watch.  Nevertheless, you can't beat Veggie Tales as a gift for a young one!
My grandsons love it.
Always 5 stars!
Love Veggie Tales!
Children will enjoy this veggie tale.
Fun for all.

I sent these to my grandchildren in a far-away state.  I hope they enjoy watching them.  My own children did.
My son who is 9 has Autism.  He has every copy of Veggietales made.  He this one over and over on his Vhs till he wore it out; so we had to get is copy.
I love Veggie Tales. It's nice to find something my daughter likes to watch that I don't mind watching with her and I love that they teach a lesson in a fun way.
I am fan of veggie tales is the best to teach the word of God for the children I buy for my grandson he is  very happy. Instead  of tablet games that only put him aggressive
Great Story  I bought this movie for my grandson and he watches this movie everytime he gets in the van.  He has almost all the collection.
Very good morals for children. These days its hard to find something that teaches good values and responsibility to kids.
excellent! thank you so much! the product received as promised and my daughter loves it! thank you so very much

I have 7 children.  Only 2 still at home (14 yrs. and 17 yrs.) but now I have Grand children and they love Veggie Tales as much as my children did!  I am so happy I am able to carry the tradition of wonderful, Bible entertainment that the children love.  My 2 yr. old grandson can sing the introductory song by heart...has been since he was just over a year!  My 7 month, 1 yr, and 2 yr all enjoy the shows!  P.S. My 14 watches them with his nephews...but don't tell anyone...but I think he loves them just as much as they do!
Is a really good material for kids and adults but i was exited about dvds because i want it for my son in law of one year and she does not speak english.

I wish they had just made up a story rather than having it so loosely based on a bible account.  Cute ideas, but I'd rather it didn't refer to actual Bible characters so it could be said to just be a cartoon.
I got this for my son to replace one that got left at his dad's house.  He loves this one.
I absolutely love VeggieTales. These DVDs arrived on time and in perfect condition. It will be a real treat for our Pre-k Sunday School class for their movie time!
Great set of Veggietale episodes...especially for the price.  DVD came brand new and was just what we were looking for.

VEGGIETALES!  Enough said!  People of all ages can receive a refresher course in morality, respect, and kindness to one and all by watching any all all of the Veggietales.  Just added to my collections
We really enjoy these DVDs. They are a wonderful way to introduce children to Bible stories and the Heroes of Scripture.
great message for children and adults. all dvd of veggie tales are simple messages with powerful messages for young and old alike.

We bought this and other dvd's for our church's youth program.
We have a varied age group that we expose this dvd to and we would highly recommend this to you or your church program.
I have purchased many veggie tales DVDs and am always satisfied.  This in one of my son's favorite.  Thank you
It keeps my 2year old engaged in the stories because of the characters used.he loves laura carrot lol and bob the tomato.

These Veggie Tale DVDs are a wonderful way for my grandchildren to learn about Bible characters and silly songs! Fourteen years ago I bought my first Veggie Tale VHS for my first grandchild and today I am still purchasing these exciting and fun stories (I have eight grandchildren now!)
My daughter is 15 months old and LOVES Veggie Tales...my husband is a bug fan too!! This Heros of the Bible DVD is wonderful, I love having more than one show on a disc!

bought several of the Veggie Tales DVD's - am not happy with them at all.  they are too long - some were 45 minutes long.  also the story from the bible often times does not coincide with the story on the DVD. I won't be buying anymore.
great gift for little ones
My son's new favorite.

Veggie Tales: Heroes of the Bible - Moses, Miriam and Joseph. I feels it was too loosely based on the Bible. I received "Heroes of the Bible - Lions, Shepherds and Queens" as a gift and found it very good, but this one strayed to far from the actual stories to be worth while. I had my doubts with it being changed to a western. Moe (Moses) riding a buffalo and dressing like the lone ranger and calling out "hi ho silver" when he throws his stick down to become a rattlesnake was a small part compared to many other changes. I don't feel kids are that much into westerns now a days and the venue change from Egypt to the Rocky Mountains was not necessary. I would not recommend this one. I would recommend "Veggie Tales - Heroes of the Bible - Lions, Shepherds and Queens (Oh My!)". The latter made my little girl want to read the real stories out of the Bible, while with this one I don't think she would be able to make the comparisons.
Son loves it
Another cute Veggietales movie. Arrived when expected. Thank you!
